content: Sandberg believes resilience — the capacity to recover quickly from difficulty — is a muscle that can be strengthened over time. And certainly, if there were a weight-lifting competition for resilience, she’d likely place near the top, because she’s spent the past two years building that muscle. Consider OptionB.Org her guide for everyone else — methods for lessening the isolation, silence, and despair that accompany everything from death and loss to sexual assault.
